transport.question: I have wheels and can take you places, but I'm not a car. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 You pedal me to move.
👧 Children often learn to ride me.
🛣️ I'm great for short trips and exercise.

transport.question: I travel on rails, carrying many passengers. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I make a 'choo choo' sound.
🎫 You need a ticket to ride me.
🏞️ I can travel long distances through cities and countryside.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away lands. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings, but I'm not a bird.
☁️ I fly high above the clouds.
🛂 You need a passport to travel on me internationally.

transport.question: I travel on water and can carry many people or goods across the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I float on the water.
🚢 I am bigger than a rowboat.
⚓ I often have an anchor.

transport.question: I take people around town and stop at designated stops. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am bigger than a car.
⏱️ I run on a schedule.
🚏 You wait for me at a bus stop.

transport.question: I'm a vehicle with two wheels and an engine, and you wear a helmet when you ride me. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can be quite noisy.
🛣️ I am faster than a bicycle, but can't carry as many people as a bus.
🏍️ You need a license to drive me.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down, and have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I am often used for rescue missions.
🏥 I can land on top of buildings, unlike airplanes.
🚨 I am different from an airplane.

transport.question: I travel underground and transport people quickly through the city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I'm also called a subway in some places.
🚦 I avoid traffic jams because I'm underground.
🗺️ You use a map to navigate me.

transport.question: I am a long vehicle that delivers goods all over the country. What am I?

hints.text: 🚚 I am bigger than a car, but smaller than a train.
📦 I often carry boxes or other containers.
🛣️ I spend most of my time on highways.

transport.question: I travel on water and can quickly move people or goods across short distances. What am I?

hints.text: ⛴️ I am like a floating bridge.
🚗 I can even carry cars.
↔️ I travel between two points usually.

food.question: I am yellow, long, and curved. Monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys enjoy eating me.
💛 My color is often associated with happiness.
🌱 I grow on trees.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from a farm animal.
🥛 I'm often poured into a glass.
🍪 I taste great with chocolate chip treats.

food.question: I am round and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny's favorite food.
🌱 I grow in the ground.
🧡 My color matches a pumpkin.

food.question: I am a dessert, often eaten with ice cream. I'm made of flour, sugar, and baked. What am I?

hints.text: 🎂 People have me on their birthdays.
🔥 I need to be baked in an oven.
🍦 I'm delicious with a frozen treat on top.

food.question: I am small, green, and often found in a pod. I'm good to eat with dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I'm a vegetable.
🌱 I grow in pods.
🍽️ I'm often served as a side dish.

food.question: I am a popular topping on pizza and spaghetti. I am red and juicy. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am often used to make sauce.
🌱 I grow on a vine.
🍕 I am a key ingredient on pizza.

food.question: I have a hard shell and come in different colors. You can crack me open and eat what's inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels love to bury me.
🌳 I grow on trees.
💪 I'm a good source of protein.

food.question: I am made from potatoes and fried in oil. I am often served with ketchup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I'm a popular side dish at fast food restaurants.
🥔 I start as a root vegetable.
🧂 Salt makes me taste even better.

food.question: I am a grain that can be cooked in many ways. I am a staple food in many countries. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I am the main part of sushi.
🌾 I grow in paddies.
🌍 Many people around the world eat me every day.

food.question: I am a spread made from ground sesame seeds. I am often eaten with pita bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🥙 I'm a common ingredient in Middle Eastern cuisine.
🌱 I'm made from a tiny seed.
🥣 I have a creamy texture.
